product_name: Green Label Organic Go With the Flow T-Shirt - Men's
long_description: Made in America with 100% certified organic cotton, the Green Label Organic Go With the Flow T-shirt is designed with the planet in mind while still delivering great comfort. Organic cotton is grown without the use of toxic pesticides. Fabric is gently garment-washed with low-impact dyes; tag-free neck ensures comfort. Patented water-based printing technology uses no PVCs or harsh resins, producing a breathable print. Green Label Organic Go With the Flow T-shirt is preshrunk.
short_description: Made in America with 100% certified organic cotton, the Green Label Organic Go With the Flow T-shirt is designed with the planet in mind while still delivering great comfort.
